title.rendered: AS FROM MARCH 2021 (ONGOING). PROJECT SISTER CITIES OF PEACE FOR CHILDREN

content.rendered: Project Sister Cities of Peace for Children (in collaboration with Khaneh Sarbaz Solh Iran (The House of Iran’s Peace Corps)).The project aims to strengthen capacities for peace for children and their parents and to promote the culture of peace in family, to enhance safety, prosperity and quality of life and negotiate with local authorities and governments to officially recognize the new name and its terms, to provide mass media for announcements, campaigns. Several activities are being implemented such as the festivals, capacity building workshops, talks (on several themes namely: Peace for the sake of Peace Inner Peace; Peace within Family; Peace for Children; Peace in Literature; Peace in Arts; Peace and Sport Peace in Cultural Heritage; Peace in Religions; Peace and Nature; Peace and Prosperity; Peace and Safety; Peace and Veterans; Peace and child soldiers); Productions (Novels/short Stories; Dramas; Poems ;Articles; Photos; Video Clips Music; Motion Graphics/Animations ; Podcasts; Paintings/Drawings; Caricature).
